item.title: Introduction to Convolutional Neural Networks
item.description: body { text-align: justify} Convolutional Neural Networks is one of the most sucesfully and used Neural Network Algorithm. Artificial Neural Network receive an input (single vector), and transform it through a series of hidden layers.
